data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
A pure perl, illustrative (ie. clear code and slow performance) of
    T.Kohonen's Self-Organising Feature Maps (SOMs). It compliments the
    existing "straight" AI::NeuralNet pacakge.

    I thought about naming it AI::SOM, but it *is* a neural net, even
    if current NN perl authors don't recognise it! And
    AI::NeuralNet::SOM was a thought, but there are other
    implimentations of SOMs, so that would be greedy. Then,
    AI::NeuralNet::SOM::Kohonen was just silly...!
